thread.title: Viral Photo: Ranveer Singh's eccentric outfit reminds trolls of 'condoms'
thread.title_full: Viral Photo: Ranveer Singh's eccentric outfit reminds trolls of 'condoms' - Entertainment

author: mid-day online correspondent
title: Viral Photo: Ranveer Singh's eccentric outfit reminds trolls of 'condoms'
text:
Bollywood star Ranveer Singh, who is known for his funky sense of dressing, makes waves online for the onesie outfit he wore to Shahid Kapoor's pre-birthday bash with troll comparing him to condoms and sperms

Ranveer Singh snapped leaving a pre-birthday party for Shahid Kapoor. Pic/Yogen Shah 
Bollywood star Ranveer Singh is known for his funky sense of dressing, he makes headlines time and again for his saartorial choices.
Recently, pictures of the actor attending the pre-birthday bash of Shahid Kapoor went viral thanks to his eccentric fashion sense.
Staying true to his style, the 'Bajirao Mastani' star attended the event in a onesie-hoodie outfit that left Twitterati in splits.
Most of the people who are waiting for a reason to troll celebs took to the micro-blogging site to pick on the actor for his fashion sense, comparing him with sperms, condoms and a lot more.  
HERE'S HOW TROLLS REACTED: 
Ranveer - I am horny

Deepika - Ok. Let's do it. But wear protection, ok?

Ranveer - Say no more pic.twitter.com/0eLY7oFquZ 
— Sagar (@sagarcasm) February 20, 2017 @sagarcasm oh my godðÂÂÂðÂÂÂðÂÂÂsagar, man you're funny..loved the joke.. though I'm in love with Ranveer and his outfit yet it made me go lol..ðÂÂ¹
— Ranveer Deewani (@SinghsBae) February 20, 2017 @tongsincheek lol exactly, it doesn't surprise me anymore, i see him wear a weird outfit and i'm like 'thats just ranveer' :)
— RanveerxDeepika (@zara008) February 20, 2017 Well, I must confess that I'm disturbed by that Ranveer Singh outfit but the guy has made an impact. I believe that was the objective
— VK (@TheMantallBwoy) February 20, 2017 Mom: Beta purana macchardani ka kya karein?
Ranveer Singh: Dont worry mom! pic.twitter.com/5jJF0yiZMY 
— Urban Monk (@iUrbanMonk) February 20, 2017 Funeral after party dress code. pic.twitter.com/ZfMqHdNLd3 
— Godman Chikna (@Madan_Chikna) February 20, 2017 Ranveer Singh got himself laminated. #RanveerSingh #Protection pic.twitter.com/BoUJp7RCa7 
— Dr. Gill (@ikpsgill1) February 20, 2017 How @RanveerOfficial was born. pic.twitter.com/dkeac290eg 
— East India Comedy (@EastIndiaComedy) February 20, 2017 New Terrorist Outfit is launched by d Ranveer Singh. https://t.co/a10TM934Fr 
— EddieJain (@eddie_vdj) February 20, 2017 When you zoom into your sperm using a microscope. pic.twitter.com/dA7AnoX1Uu 
— Sahil Shah (@SahilBulla) February 20, 2017 [David Attenborough voice]

And here we see a sperm whale, far from its natural habitat, answering a mating call cuz her parents aren't home pic.twitter.com/UCZSvCahev 
— alt-rtsh (@floydimus) February 20, 2017 This isn't the first time that Ranveer has made news for his sartorial choices. 
Ranveer in his got-out-of-bed ensemble at an award ceremony in June 2015. File Pic 
He hit the red carpet of an award ceremony in June 2015 dressed in Muppet jammies, fluffy Sylvester slippers, a red bathrobe, a black Charlie Chaplin hat and cane. Needless to say his out-of-the-box look stole the show.  

Ranveer Singh at the launch of 'Befikre' song 'Khulke Dulke' at Delhi University. Pic/Yogen Shah 
The actor broke the internet once again in November 2016 when he was seen in this outlandish outfit while promoting 'Befikre'.
